website_summaries.verdict: A unique flavor while providing a good source of omega-3s.
pros: Each serving contains more than 750 milligrams of omega-3s with a natural lemon mint flavor
There's no fishy taste or aftertaste and there are no added synthetic vitamins
cons: Some other brands have more omega-3 per serving than this one

customer_reviews.title: ... decided to try this bc I heard it was good for acne and PCOS
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this bc I heard it was good for acne and PCOS. I had 3 large cysts on my left ovary and they are completely gone. My skin is also looking really healthy and my acne is almost gone. My pores are smaller than they have ever been. I had stopped using acne meds and my skin broke out horribly and I really didn’t want to start finding other meds to use but my skin was so bad it was depressing. I decided to try this along w/ zinc and I feel like it’s made the difference in my skin and PCOS health.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Davis

customer_reviews.title: I was able to qualify for not the best price for life insurance
customer_reviews.text: I have a liver disease which turns my eyes yellow. When I take this, my eyes turn white. I've tried other brands, but GOL is the only brand which reduces the blood count levels associated with my liver. Thanks to this product, I was able to qualify for not the best price for life insurance, but the second best price. Prior to this, companies would not issue it because of my high liver blood count levels.
customer_reviews.author: RaiderFan

customer_reviews.title: Just ordered my second bottle
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting to have to choke this down; I've always read and heard such terrible things about the taste of cod liver oil. Not this. It's actually quite good! I'm AMAZED at the almost immediate difference in my skin and how quickly little cuts are healing. I bought this for the benefit of the Vitamin A, and given my body's improvements, it seems to be working well and quickly. I just ordered my second bottle. This is now a staple in my health regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Siler

customer_reviews.title: Good for you
customer_reviews.text: After using this product for several months I can say I have noticed an improvement in my eye health. I started taking this for dry eyes. I keep it in the refrigerator and just take it straight with no chaser needed. The flavor is minty but not unpleasant and there is no trace of fish.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: it definitely tastes better cold. My two year old saw me taking ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I'd bought cod liver oil. I'd read a lot about the benefits of it and decided to give it a try. This brand seems reasonably priced for the quality of product that you get. The first time I tasted it I wasn't sure about taking it. Then I stuck it in the fridge (as per the instructions). To me, it definitely tastes better cold. My two year old saw me taking it one day and demanded some for himself. He had absolutely no problem with the taste and actually declared that it was "yummy" Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: so I knew this would be good for me
customer_reviews.text: I have many health problems and three big heart issues, so I knew this would be good for me, but I dreaded and put off taking it as I don't like fishy flavor, only very mild fish like Swai or Cod. Well I actually like this! There is no fishy taste - it truly is no problem to take. There is the oily feeling but I put it at the back of my mouth and swallow quickly, and it works great. And I actually want more of the taste! Happy to have found this.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A fish oil that doesn't taste like fish! I will never take unflavored fish oil ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! A fish oil that doesn't taste like fish! I will never take unflavored fish oil ever again after trying this. Not only does it have a great lemon minty flavor, but there are no fishy burps afterward​. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Naygirl

customer_reviews.title: Feed You Head
customer_reviews.text: My brain loves Garden of Life Cod Liver Oil. I'm glad I found this product. I noticed I had way better memory and mental clarity after about three weeks on one teaspoon a day, in the morning. What's bad is that once I let my re-order lapse, and fell back on taking regular 1-gram gel caps of fish oil. They were no match for the real deal. I noticed the difference and had to come back to what works. Now I'm back mentally. This product is great! And, as another side-effect, I can do deep knee bends at 67 and 270 lbs. I couldn't do that before. I'll keep taking it as long as they keep making it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Prevents my cystic acne
customer_reviews.text: I started taking cod liver oil for my adult acne based on some online research recommendations. I had been getting horrible painful cystic acne all on my jawline and when I consistently take my cod liver oil, I have zero cysts. Although this is not the miracle treatment we all are looking for, I highly recommend to include in your acne regimen. There is no fishy taste and I don’t get those horrible “fish burps” either!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren T.

customer_reviews.title: Awful packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great taste but the bottle is awful. They need to add a pour spout to the top. It's very messy and you lose a lot of the product... the oil runs down the sides of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: awaller

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a different cod liver oil in capsule form from another company because it was a good deal and I never saw a difference in my skin (which is why I was taking it) after taking it religiously for months. I got this product this week and after a few DAYS my skin is literally GLOWING. I also thought that since it was a liquid I would hate the taste but it actually tastes kind of good...? Like, what? I didn’t expect that. I’m very happy with this product and would recommend you guys just spend a little more and get the quality over quantity. Your body will thank you! I will be purchasing again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Mary P

customer_reviews.title: Nice Taste
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for a week. Easy to take everyday since it doesn't have a fishy taste. I'm already in good health and take multivitamins, exercise and eat a healthy diet. So, I'm not sure if I will easily see benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Cod Liver Oil
customer_reviews.text: Really like Garden of Life’s products and this is no exception. It’s not fishy tasting (until it starts to get old—but all oils start to get rancid at some point and a good way to judge rancidity is taste) and is of good quality, unlike some fish oils I’ve tried that have been rancid even though they were brand new. It has a light lemon flavor which is nice. Cod liver oil is a good fat and has vit A & D as well as omega 3s, all important for good health.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to add cod liver oil to my diet for its purported health benefits. Unfortunately that won't be possible with this product. The taste was repugnant. Like a cross between plastic and garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Holston

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I give this to my kids. I have a five-year-old and almost 2-year-old and a six month old and I give them all this called liver oil and they all take it without a problem. I think they actually kind of like it. I’ve taken it myself and I find that it has only the slightest fishy aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!! Kids love it (3-6yr olds)
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this! The lemon mint flavor isn't very strong at all which is awesome. Some brands make it really strong.. I ordered 2 bottles since they're 8oz each. And a lot cheaper than some other brands. I will definitely be buying from them every month!
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Works for all my menopause symptoms.
customer_reviews.text: Taste is ok. I swallow a drink of cold water immediately after taking this. Works great. Took away my menopause symptoms within 5 days!!! Listen up women going through the terrible menopause symptoms. Try this. Omegas work.
customer_reviews.author: Calif Mom

customer_reviews.title: Always Have This On Hand
customer_reviews.text: I take cod liver oil (and give it to my family members) at the first sign of illness (along with a couple of other natural remedies like collodial silver and four thieves oil) and we have managed to stay quite healthy. I've purchased several brands of cod liver oil, including this one. This is the one we are using currently and I would recommend it. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good taste
customer_reviews.text: Cap was cracked when I received it but good taste.
customer_reviews.author: Pat O'Roak

customer_reviews.title: so it's pretty easy to take
customer_reviews.text: I have never gone wrong with Garden of Life products, and this Cod Liver oil is no different! It doesn't have that typical "fishy"taste, so it's pretty easy to take. I can even give it to my teenage son, and he doesn't give me a hard time because of taste. I would definitely purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Shea C.

customer_reviews.title: Cod liver oil is still available!
customer_reviews.text: Flavored cod liver oil - is the only option these days. It’s OK but I would prefer the unflavored, the way it comes out of the Cod’s Liver. I am even a little surprised we are still able to get cod liver oil in that the fishing limitations on Cod are so restrictive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this cod liver oil
customer_reviews.text: This cod liver oil is a great alternative to the expensive fermented kind. The vitamin A and D have not been processed out and then artificially added back in like a lot of other cheap cod liver oils. I also really like the flavor and have never had problems with fishy burps.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: no noticeable difference from taking it. was interested in getting a good fish oil to take because of lockdown. seemed ok. didn't sleep any better/worse. very good price for a quality product. will i purchase again?? probably not.
customer_reviews.author: alan ransom

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad taste
customer_reviews.text: I began taking this because I heard it was good for osteoporosis. I don't mind the taste. I can taste the cod but the lemon and mint mask it. I may order again. I have since read fermented cod liver oil is best but if the taste is not masked, I will stick with this brand. I kind of wish it came with a measured dropper. I hate pouring it out into a spoon but them I'm kind of a big baby about things like that.
customer_reviews.author: Мартин

customer_reviews.title: ... since when did cod liver oil turn out to be yummy?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: It tastes like lemons and mint. I even got my husband to try it... and he liked the flavor. That man wouldn't go near fishy-smelling stuff if you used a cattle prod and offered him a million dollars, so that's quite an accomplishment! I really do enjoy taking this stuff. D vitamins for the win! (I don't get as much sun as might be healthy, ya know?)
customer_reviews.author: A. Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Surprisingly, the lemon/mint makes the overall flavor much more tolerable than straight cod liver oil.
customer_reviews.text: Flavor has always been an issue relative to cod liver oil. Based on some other reviews, my wife and I decided to try this. Wow - the lemon/mint really helps turn the 'cod liver ordeal' into a very tolerable experience. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Carter S.

customer_reviews.title: Garden of life is still the best
customer_reviews.text: This product has been around for a long time, and we will keep using it. Garden of Life makes the cleanest supplements of any brand, hands down!
customer_reviews.author: kindred

customer_reviews.title: The oil there had a lemon flavor that I really enjoyed and this matches it perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Drank cod liver oil with breakfast each day while on vacation in Iceland last year. The oil there had a lemon flavor that I really enjoyed and this matches it perfectly. No fishy burps. Definitely not the stuff my mother gave me as a child!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take
customer_reviews.text: As described. Easy to take. Put it in a smoothie. Pleased with seller.
customer_reviews.author: CindyKay Clark

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: This tastes amazing. I was pleasantly surprised by the. Ice flavor. My 9 yr old also liked it.
customer_reviews.author: CozyKimmi

customer_reviews.title: No fish burps
customer_reviews.text: Still a funky flavor but wa-a-y better than plain Cod Liver oil. Best thing: No fish burps
customer_reviews.author: Asanawa

customer_reviews.title: Great non-fishy flavor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help fight my hormonal acne. So far it does work but in combination with diet. It's full of Vitamin A and D as well as Omega 3 which helps remove inflammation. Flavor is good!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Voytenko

customer_reviews.title: Definitely happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Surprising flavor, my picky kids take this with no troubles. Definitely happy with this product, light minty lemon flavor- absolutely no fishy flavor or smell. My toddler takes it easily as well as a very picky teen. I'm very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: MintOreo

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like lemon and mint
customer_reviews.text: Can't even taste the fish. Tastes like lemon and mint
customer_reviews.author: Shayna McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for avoiding bad flavor
customer_reviews.text: Citrus flavor with a mint after taste. Not fishy at all. Easy to take alone. Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Heather V

customer_reviews.title: lemon furniture polish, yum.
customer_reviews.text: spray some lemon furniture polish on your tongue to get a taste of what this stuff is like. On the bright side, does not taste fishy at all.
customer_reviews.author: mookie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes fine.
customer_reviews.text: This oil has a light lemon flavor but it isn't over powering. I cant said that it's working nor not yet but we fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Sabetha Danes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think this stuff is great - My dogs and I take it regularly. Boosts the immune system.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Gainer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it to anyone who wants to boost their immune ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this pleasant tasting product everyday and have found it to be very helpful to my health. I recommend it to anyone who wants to boost their immune system.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Bechtle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste of this product much better than the previous brand I tried, so this is my 2nd order of this product. I'll keep ordering. It also came with an unexpected free lotion sample, who h was a nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Beth S.

customer_reviews.title: you can't find a better taste. It works so well too
customer_reviews.text: For Cod Liver Oil, you can't find a better taste. It works so well too, I know I'm getting my Omega's and I don't have to take near as many gel tabs. Great Product! And I'll definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Nic Claybrook

customer_reviews.title: Love this supplement! Kids take it!
customer_reviews.text: My children willingly take this and I also enjoy the taste! Lemony mint! Seems to be high quality! I prefer this over fermented capsules we were taking.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: A good quality cod liver oil from a reputable company.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good cod liver oil with a fair price
customer_reviews.author: garyofeagan

customer_reviews.title: Actually Tolerable....
customer_reviews.text: Nice lemony minty flavor.... Keep in refrigerator!! Not like the taste you remember soooooo well as a child holding your nose and quickly as you possibly can swallowing that nasty stuff of old.... This is Truly Ok!!! Kinda nice really!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Franklin

customer_reviews.title: The only brand that I buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY brand of cod liver oil that I buy. It works, and I always notice a difference when I use this. They do not sell in stores anymore, so I'm happy that Amazon has it!! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Beautifulgirl

customer_reviews.title: A gamble?
customer_reviews.text: Product tastes ok.I ended up wondering if it was tested for mercury.I went to manufacturers web site and asked.They never got back to me. So, I switched to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Really works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Can definitely feel a difference when I take it - much clearer thinking. It also helps my daughter with her headaches from a brain injury.
customer_reviews.author: madmit

customer_reviews.title: Nice and pleasant tasting, so satisfied with this cod liver oil.  Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike a out it, pleasantly surprised at the mild taste.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product for better health. I found the taste to be almost pleasant ( it is cod liver oil after all). No bad aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy L. Lansbery

customer_reviews.title: every one is excellent! This tastes fine
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat Garden of Life products....every one is excellent! This tastes fine, too!
customer_reviews.author: S. Knox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to take cod liver oil
customer_reviews.text: Excellent way to take cod liver oil. Pour a little in your smoothie for a nice minty flavor. Helps immunity especially during flu season.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Kosek

customer_reviews.title: Toddler approved taste! :)
customer_reviews.text: I read about the benefits of cod liver oil for a while before purchasing but knew I wanted to give it to my 1 year old son. I wasn't sure how he'd take it but to my surprise he LOVES it! He's two now and takes it a couple times a week and when he sees the bottle he gets so excited! I'll admit, I don't take it myself like I should but I like that he enjoys it and reaps the benefits!
customer_reviews.author: CrunchyKaty

customer_reviews.title: I know this stuff is supposed to be good for you
customer_reviews.text: I know this stuff is supposed to be good for you, but I still don't like the taste of it very much. It's manageable though. It's oil, so of course it tastes oily. That's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: ascher

customer_reviews.title: No fishy taste
customer_reviews.text: I have had cod liver oil before and I was not looking forward to the fishy flavor. But this one only tastes like mint. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: NatalieO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality - I keep reordering this and stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: Has zero fishy scent to piss those picky kids. A marvelous freshness and no aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have any smell or fishy taste. Has a very bright lemon zest flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Now, it doesn’t taste as bad, liken to when I was a kid growing up. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I've been advised by an herbalist that I've been seeing to try Cod Liver Oil for my dry skin and muscle aches. I do like fish but the thought of drinking a oil made for with it was not appealing at all. I was very pleasantly surprised by how good this oil tastes. Nothing but a faint hint of lemon/lime in it and it's not unpleasant to take at all. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Waugh

customer_reviews.title: Gift for grandaughter
customer_reviews.text: The only kind of cod liver oil that she will take. She says it has really helped her feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Moire

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I've used Carlson in the past - wanted to save a couple of dollars and give this a try. It's good - but I do detect more of the fishy flavor with this. That is the only difference. To me (being a fish hater...which is why I need to get this in my diet) that's a big deal. But..it's not so bad that I won't trudge through it and use it up. If it was too detectable - I wouldn't be able to touch it.
customer_reviews.author: half pint

customer_reviews.title: I keep it refrigerated and it's not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Very mild flavored. I keep it refrigerated and it's not bad at all. I switched from the Blue Ice fermented blend, and I much prefer this. It smells better, tastes better, and I've also noticed a big improvement in my keratosis pilaris since I started using this brand. I plan to order again. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: abbaloosa

customer_reviews.title: Cod Liver oil
customer_reviews.text: The lemon mint flavor is tasty, and not at all fishy! Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Lee D

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Afraid of taking liquid cod liver oil? Afraid it'll taste like fish? Not here, my friend. This is light, not offensive in the least. I had my father and husband both take a spoonful before telling them what it was ("just TRY it!")...neither had a clue, and both were pleasantly surprised! As I am on the Weston Price protocol for tooth decay ("Cure Tooth Decay" by Ramiel Nagel is a must if you have children with cavities! It works!), cod liver oil is a staple in our home...and after trying different brands (Blue Pastures in particular), I will be sticking with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product helps immensely with my emotions! Great quality and best cod liver oil with the most vitamins that you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Guffey

customer_reviews.title: awesome seller
customer_reviews.text: great quality. as described. packaged very well, much care given
customer_reviews.author: JENNYBIOFLEUR

customer_reviews.title: Younger looking skin
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this, and my skin looks better. Glowing. There's nothing like the Omega's for your health, from the inside out. Waiting to see if it helps my dental health.
customer_reviews.author: Mama San

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have had more energy and less digestive issues since taking this product.
customer_reviews.author: AlexioTroy

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great service!
customer_reviews.text: I've tasted better flavored cod liver oil, but the price is right on this product, and the service is fantastic. I often have it in 1-2 days! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 6 Girls

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Better tasting and easier to digest than FCLO. The FCLO had no noticeable health benefits compared to this product in my opinion. Improves my skin problems and overall sense of well being.
customer_reviews.author: Clelia Biamonti

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I agree with all the other positive reviews here. This one has a tolerable taste (strong lemon, like in an extract or essential oil, with a bit of mint). But more importantly it has a really good amt of Vitamin A (4500IU) and Omega 3s. And the Vitamin A & D are naturally occuring, not added in after processing, so I feel good about taking this every day. I use the recommended amt of 1 tsp. This is my second bottle, I haven't noticed any changes, but hoping this will keep colds away and add good fats to my diet.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: No fish taste, makes my skin better! My husband and kids take it too without complain , will be getting some more
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C McGovern

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking Garden of Life cod liver oil for a couple of weeks now and I think it's great. I find the lemon/mint flavor quite tasty, especially if mixed with warm milk, butter and honey. It disguises the oily feeling too. It's too soon to see any health improvement, but I'll definately order again.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: I love Garden of LIght products
customer_reviews.text: I love Garden of LIght products, but at times the taste can prevent me from taking them. This taste was great and the mint was mild but stuck out to take away from a fishy taste. I am just not sure I have noticed any difference in my health since taking it, but I am sure it is doing something.
customer_reviews.author: rmcorkie

customer_reviews.title: The reviews don't lie, no fishy taste!
customer_reviews.text: After being diagnosed with psoriatic disease, I read the benefits of cod liver oil for skin and joints so I decided to order this particular one. After reading the reviews on how there was no fishy taste I was skeptical. But low and behold there isn't a fishy taste at all, only a slightly awkward lemon/mint essential oil taste. If your not into that fishy after taste or burp, this is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Nix

customer_reviews.title: Greatt way to get strong nails!
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking the recommend dosage (1 teaspoon per day) for over 2 months now. My once brittle, crackly nails are now stronger than ever! When I say my nails were bad...they'd break off all the time, split, ugh - you name it! This stuff works from the inside out and gives you lovely, healthy, strong nails! I'm also certain it has lots of great health benefits, but I bought it to make my nails stronger. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cod Liver Oil
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Garden of Life products and the Cod Liver Oil meets all my expectation. This is a great product
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Russell

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell, this is a very high quality Cod Liver Oil that I believe will help my overall health and even the fluidity of my joints over time. I personally like to get a small glass of warm water and put a teaspoon of this oil in the water and drink it down.......
customer_reviews.author: Brewman

customer_reviews.title: A good priced cod liver oil
customer_reviews.text: This cod oil has a high amount of vitamin A and D, which is great at lessing the severity of colds and the flu.The only concern is weather they are natural amounts proportioned in there natural state.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: great oil, bad bottle
customer_reviews.text: The oil is fine, we've ordered it before. The lid, however, was cracked, unbeknownst to me, and the first shake of the bottle resulted in cod liver oil all over my counter. Ick. I'd like a complimentary bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is good-tasting cod liver oil with added vitamin D. I have used it for the past few months and am very satisfied with it. The price is lower than other brands of cod liver oil and I like the fact that I don't have to purchase vitamin D separately to take with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E.

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff1
customer_reviews.text: It came quickly and I can't taste the 'fishiness' like I can with the gel caps from the store. It tastes like minty lemon. That tastes DOES stay on you for a bit though, an hour or so. I will order this kind again.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Spa in a bottle!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years and love it. Good skin products work on the surface.....this works from the inside out.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Mom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't think I liked this at first (certainly not straight - made me ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think I liked this at first (certainly not straight - made me sick to my stomach) but it's great blended in smoothies and yogurt. My daughter loves it, doesn't notice a fishy taste at all!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Grimm

customer_reviews.title: The taste is what I imagine mint extract would taste like straight. I am happy with the product for ...
customer_reviews.text: This oil is not fishy at all, but it has a very strong flavor and the experience of swallowing a spoonful of oil takes some getting used to. I can tolerate it, but my children were absolutely unable to tolerate the strong mint taste and the texture. The taste is what I imagine mint extract would taste like straight. I am happy with the product for myself, I just wish my kids could take it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This oil works great for my leaky nose runs
customer_reviews.text: This oil works great for my leaky nose runs. Other than that, can't tell much of a difference. Love this product, inexpensive than the fermented ones. Kids hate the taste but are willing to take it. Seems to help with the kids being sick. Definitely recommended, wish it was on prime.
customer_reviews.author: majorality

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As everyone else said it's near-impossible to taste the fish with the mint and lemon flavor.
customer_reviews.author: general bonkers

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: I was told that fishoil's vitamin A actually helps control the amount of sebum your sebaceous glands produce. I took one spoonful in the day and night. When I woke up the next morning my face was about 60% less oil. It won't get rid of all the oil but it helps take away that shiny look from your face. I love this product and will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: best there is
customer_reviews.text: This is as good as Cod Liver Oil gets but be prepared for it to repeat itself as Cod Liver Oil tends to do.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth while
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to use this as a healing oil, the smell is so strong it was not something I could not tolerate the smell. I had to wash the washcloth 3 times to remove the smell and take 2 showers.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri1953

customer_reviews.title: Beware, lemon-flavored
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, this is an excellent cod liver oil recommended by the Weston A. Price Foundation. My only gripe is that I ordered it thinking it was unflavored. (We add a bit of organic cinnamon oil to unflavored cod liver oil, and I think it's perfect.) If you look at the bottle closely, however, you will see that the photos of both the Garden of Life Cod Liver Oil and the Garden of Life Lemon Mint Cod Liver Oil show the label, Lemon Mint flavored. They are not offering both a lemon-mint and a plain, unflavored version. Having said all that, I'd say the flavor is okay, although I do prefer a light cinnamon flavoring.
customer_reviews.author: Editor Bill

customer_reviews.title: Nothing changed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice any difference while taking it. It also ran out pretty fast. I started with 1 tsp a day then upgraded to 2 when I didn't notice a difference with 1. I broke out on my face and shoulders more. That's about it....
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: NOT Fermented Cod Liver Oil
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. The reason I can't say better is because I was very specifically looking for Fermented CLO and this appears in the search results. After reading the description, it doesn't specifically say fermented but it is "olde world". In the "Olde World" CLO was always fermented, so I assumed wrongly that was what they meant. I took the entire bottle as directed without noticing any positive results. I've since switched to Green Pastured FCLO and was shocked with a noticeable difference within 2 days,which have only gotten better over the past few weeks. This product didn't hurt/help, so I can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fish haters unite -  this is your product!
customer_reviews.text: I can't stand fish so I started taking the capsules to supplement what I couldn't gag down in real form but no matter what brand I would get the horrid fishy burp. A friend had recommended this and I unwillingly ordered it. I almost started gagging at the thought of having to swallow it but surprisingly it's not bad. It tastes like lemon flavored olive oil and I've been taking it for six months without any fishy aftertaste. My kids will even take it without complaint.
customer_reviews.author: jayshawster

customer_reviews.title: Garden of life sold out to Nestle
customer_reviews.text: Beware, GoL have sold themselves out to Nestle! This means it's only a matter of time before all their products are tainted with filth! I will never purchase their products again. Sad day :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rancid Product.....Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mine was rancid. It took over a week to show up and the seller never contacted me back. After a few days of using it, my skin started to smell like fish oil as did my freshly washed laundry. I’m really disappointed because I love GOL and this is the first review I have written about the company with a sour product.......Had to throw it out. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: TracyAZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to more expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: I bought this twice in the last year. I've been happy with the results, and the taste is agreeable. This product does tend to stink more than some if you spill it. ;P I decant it into a smaller eyedropper bottle and drop a few shots into the back of my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S

customer_reviews.title: I would say it tastes good but it definitely doesn't taste like cod liver
customer_reviews.text: I would say it tastes good but it definitely doesn't taste like cod liver! The lemon and mint essence is all you taste. Both my husband and u take this daily and I can tell a definite difference in my knees they don't feel as stiff after sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Rpgurl81

customer_reviews.title: Best way to take cod liver oil IMO
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting cod liver oil I have tried and I have tried a bunch. I have also tried capsules but I keep hearing how so many are rancid by the time you get them. At least taking it by the teaspoon, I would be able to tell! The lemon peppermint flavor takes the fishiness out of it, thank Goodness! Cannot stand fishy taste. My husband (who is picky with regards to "healthy stuff") likes it too!
customer_reviews.author: E and K Tolson

customer_reviews.title: Good source of Vitamin A
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Cod Liver Oil. I put it on my salmon, and it does make the salmon taste a bit off until you get use to it. However, when taking the oil all by itself, the flavoring helps and is effective. I buy this over the other brands because it has more vitamin A than the other brands. GOL is also a very good company that I trust.
customer_reviews.author: GIVE Reviews

product_meta.title: Garden of Life - Olde World Icelandic Cod Liver Oil Lemon mint flavour, 8 fl oz liquid
product_meta.description:
Size:8 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Garden of Life's Olde World Icelandic Cod Liver Oil is one of nature's riches sources of natural Vitamins A and D.

BRAND STORY
By Garden of Life
feature_bullets: One serving of Olde World Icelandic Cod Liver Oil provides over 750mg of EPA and DHA Omega-3 fatty acids
Olde World Icelandic Cod Liver Oil has an all-natural lemon mint flavor
The Vitamin A in Olde World Icelandic Cod Liver Oil supports eye health, normal skin and hair structure, and healthy immune function
